stories.headline: Gold and silver prices soared, then plummeted. What’s going on?
stories.description: Analysts see various factors at play for price swings, from Trump’s unpredictability to distrust in economic systems.

stories.headline: Russia renews attacks on frozen Ukrainian cities
stories.description: Hundreds of drones and missiles struck Kyiv and Kharkiv overnight, leaving thousands of homes without heat.

stories.headline: Trump announces plan to sue Harvard for $1bn damages
stories.description: The US president writes on Truth Social that he wants ‘nothing further to do, into the future’ with the university.

stories.headline: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns
stories.description: It makes China the first country to stop the use of designs first made popular by Elon Musk's Tesla.

stories.headline: Rape trial begins for son of Norway's crown princess in tense moment for royal family
stories.description: Royal's son faces rape charges in Norway's biggest case in years.
